# correlationType

**Instance Property**

The type for this correlation.

## Declaration

```swift
var correlationType: HKCorrelationType { get }
```

## Discussion

For a complete list of correlation type identifiers, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCorrelationTypeIdentifier].

## Getting Correlation Data

- **objects**: The set of sample objects that make up the correlation.
- **objects(for:)**: Returns a set containing all the objects of the specified type in the correlation.

items.description: The set of sample objects that make up the correlation.
items.name: objects

items.description: Returns a set containing all the objects of the specified type in the correlation.
